attributes.action: pass legislation stopping EU Funding of political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE EU funds major political parties. Thus, they have a major influence on party policy. Pass legislation banning this and release details of all EU payments to UK political parties.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the EU, and we suggest you address your concerns to the EU directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
